title: Go Power: Microsoft's Bold Bet on Faster TypeScript Tools
author: Darryl K Taft; Loraine Lawson
description: Microsoft rewrites the TypeScript compiler in Go, promising dramatically faster build times, enhanced developer experience, and new AI-powered capabilities for large codebases.
cntitle: Go Power：微软在更快的 TypeScript 工具上的大胆尝试
cndescription: 微软用 Go 重写 TypeScript 编译器，有望大幅缩短构建时间、增强开发者体验，并为大型代码库提供由 AI 驱动的全新功能。
